text: Marcus Foligno and Jordan Greenway will return tonight for #mnwild vs. #Yotes. Marc-Andre Fleury will make a third straight start.
Marc-Andre Fleury will start his third game in a row tonight. #MNWild
Marc-Andre Fleury will start in goal tonight for #mnwild. Third consecutive start for him.
Marc-Andre Fleury is 8-1 since joining the Minnesota Wild and getting his 3rd consecutive start between the pipes tonight. #Flower https://t.co/9iqr4z30rf
